title: HOUR 2 - Suns, NFL, Mahomes-Herbert
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Suns, NFL, Mahomes-Herbert
description:
Colin discusses the suspension of Suns owner Robert Sarver

Why it's important to be verbal when you are a QB

Comparing Patrick Mahomes and Justin Herbert

 

Guest: Greg Cosell
